name: Quick Cloak
description: Envelop yourself in a protective cloak of razors, gaining Major Evasion for 14 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 20%.   Every 2 seconds the shrapnel will pulse, dealing 395 Physical Damage to all enemies within 5 meters.  You also gain Major Expedition for 4 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.
effectLines: Increases duration and grants Major Expedition for a short duration after casting.
coefDescription: Envelop yourself in a protective cloak of razors, gaining Major Evasion for 14 seconds, reducing damage from area attacks by 20%.   Every 2 seconds the shrapnel will pulse, dealing $1 Physical Damage to all enemies within 5 meters.  You also gain Major Expedition for 4 seconds, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.
